definitions: the classification of land according to restrictions placed on its use and development

examples.text: the property's zoning would allow taller buildings than proposed

shortDefinitions: classification of land according to restrictions

definitions: (especially in Nigeria) the practice of allocating nominations for certain political offices to candidates from particular regions as part of an unofficial power-sharing arrangement within a political party

examples.text: those opposed to zoning argued that the party's presidential standard bearer could come from any part of the country

shortDefinitions: practice of allocating nominations for political office to particular regions
